io.github.rubenchristoffer.hetty

Class HTTPRawPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rubenchristoffer.hetty.HTTPRawPacket

  • public class HTTPRawPacket
extends Object
    Raw HTTP packet. This means that header part of packet and the body is split and is in byte form. Header portion contains trailing CRLF as well.
    Author:
    Ruben Christoffer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new HTTPRawPacket.

      Gets body.

      Gets header.
      byte[] toByteArray()
      Combines header and body stream into a single byte array representing the entire packet.

      • HTTPRawPacket

        public HTTPRawPacket(ByteArrayOutputStream header,
                     ByteArrayOutputStream body)
        Creates a new HTTPRawPacket.
        Parameters:
        header - is the header stream containing header bytes for this packet
        body - is the body stream containing body bytes for this packet
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if header or body is null
